title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 8-2.7 - Brakes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 8-2.7 - Brakes

State Regulations

All hand power freight elevator machines shall be
equipped with a hand operated self-locking brake or an automatic brake
operating in both directions of travel and of ample power to securely hold the
maximum load. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
8-2.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
